article_title: DOL Clarifies Regulations For Employee Wellness Programs

article_metadata.description: As previous discussed here, proposed regulations for the Affordable Care Act ("ACA") will greatly impact employers’ ability to offer incentive-based wellness programs to their employees. The Department of Labor clarified and finalized the regulations, which go into effect on January 1, 2014.  Although the final regulations largely mirror the earlier [...]
